articles.description: RCB started off the innings on a bad note but thanks to a brilliant knock by Karthik, the Men in Red and Black managed to post in 20 overs.
articles.content:
Dinesh Karthik slammed another fifty in IPL 2022 in clash vs DC as they posted a big total on the board after being asked by Capitals to bowl first. 
Karthik slammed 66 off 34 balls that included 5 … [+737 chars]
